project.name: C-C835A-SUBV-03-ST03-DT04-DF06-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C835A-SUBV-03-ST03-DT04-DF06-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-SUBV-03-ST03-DT04-DF06-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hellowworld" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
